typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FinalCsv
FinalCsv derive(MiddleName = abs(0)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Cid = Column_1,
		FName = Column_2,
		Lname = Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		MiddleName
	)) ~> sink1
